00036 void cleanup(int ret)
00037 {
00038   // stop all mpi clients
00039 
00040 #ifdef MPI
00041   int task=TASKFIN;
00042   BroadcastTask(&task);
00043 
00044   MPI_Finalize();
00045 #endif
00046  
00047   // terminate program with return code
00048   exit(ret);
00049 }

00052 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00053 {
00054 
00055   createinfo(argc, argv);
00056 
00057 #ifdef MPI
00058   MPI_Init(&argc, &argv);
00059   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpirank);
00060   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &mpisize);
00061 
00062   // fprintf(stderr, "... [%2d] %s\n", mpirank, hostname());
00063 
00064   if (mpirank != 0) {
00065     ProjectionSlave();
00066 
00067     MPI_Finalize();
00068   } else {
00069 #endif
00070 
00071   // enough arguments ?
00072 
00073   if (argc < 4) {
00074     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPARA INTERACTION [SYMMETRY:]MBSTATE"
00075             "\n   -h                hermitize matrix elements"
00076             "\n   -K K              use only K projection"
00077             "\n   -n NORM           set minimal norm for K-mixing eigenstates"
00078             "\n   -t THRESH         set threshold for K-mixing SVD"
00079             "\n   -A                show really all eigenstates"
00080             "\n   -l                write energy level file"
00081             "\n   -s                write Eigenstates into file\n",
00082             filepart(argv[0]));
00083     cleanup(-1);
00084   }
00085 
00086   int all=0;
00087   int levels=0;
00088   int hermit=0;
00089   int Ksel=0, K;
00090   int odd;
00091   int savestates=0;
00092   double threshkmix=0.01;
00093   double minnormkmix=0.001;
00094 
00095   /* manage command-line options */
00096 
00097   char c;
00098   while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "hK:Alst:n:")) != -1)
00099     switch (c) {
00100     case 'h':
00101       hermit=1;
00102       break;
00103     case 'K':
00104       Ksel=1;
00105       K = atoi(optarg);
00106       break;
00107     case 'A':
00108       all=1;
00109       break;
00110     case 'l':
00111       levels=1;
00112       break;
00113     case 's':
00114       savestates=1;
00115       break;
00116     case 'n':
00117       minnormkmix = atof(optarg);
00118       break;
00119     case 't':
00120       threshkmix = atof(optarg);
00121       break;
00122     }
00123 
00124   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00125   char* interactionfile = argv[optind+1];
00126   char* mbfile = argv[optind+2];
00127 
00128   // get Symmetry
00129   Symmetry S;
00130   extractSymmetryfromString(&mbfile, &S);
00131 
00132   // only SlaterDets can be used as many-body states up to now
00133   SlaterDet Q;
00134   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, mbfile))
00135     cleanup(-1);
00136 
00137   // get rid of path in filename
00138   char* mbname = filepart(mbfile);
00139 
00140   Interaction Int;
00141   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00142     cleanup(-1);
00143   Int.cm = 1;
00144 
00145 #ifdef MPI
00146   int task=TASKSTART;
00147   BroadcastTask(&task);
00148   
00149   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00150   BroadcastA(&Q.A);
00151 #endif
00152 
00153   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00154   odd = Q.A % 2;
00155 
00156   // Projection parameters
00157   Projection P;
00158   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00159 
00160   _setangkappacrit(25.0);
00161 
00162   initOpObservables(&Int);
00163 
00164   // initialize space for matrix elements
00165   Observablesod **obsme = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables);
00166 
00167   // try to read ME's from file, if not possible calculate and save
00168 
00169   if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile, mbfile, &P, &OpObservables, S, S, obsme)) {
00170 #ifdef MPI
00171     calcprojectedMBMEmpi(&P, &OpObservables, &Q, &Q, S, S, obsme);
00172 #else
00173     calcprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &Q, &Q, S, S, obsme);
00174 #endif
00175     writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile, mbfile, &P, &OpObservables, S, S, obsme);
00176   }
00177 
00178   // scale matrix elements
00179   if (Int.mescaling) {
00180     fprintf(stderr, "... scaling matrix elements\n");
00181     scaleprojectedObservablesMBME(&P, &Int, obsme);
00182   }
00183 
00184   // hermitize MEs
00185   if (hermit)
00186     hermitizeprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme, 1);
00187 
00188   // solve the eigenvalue problem
00189   Eigenstates E;
00190   initEigenstates(&P, &E, 1);
00191   if (Ksel) 
00192     calcEigenstatesK(&P, &Int, &obsme, &E, K, threshkmix);
00193   else
00194     calcEigenstates(&P, &Int, &obsme, &E, threshkmix);
00195 
00196   // calculate expectation values
00197   Observablesod** obs = initprojectedVector(&P, &OpObservables, 1);
00198   calcexpectprojectedMBME(&P, &OpObservables, &obsme, &S, &E, obs);
00199     
00200   // sort Eigenstates
00201   sortEigenstates(&P, &Int, obs, &E, minnormkmix, all);
00202 
00203   // write output
00204   FILE *outfp; 
00205   char outfilename[255];
00206 
00207   snprintf(outfilename, 255, "%s%s.%s", mbfile, 
00208            S==0 ? "" : strjoin(":", SymmetrytoStr(S)),  
00209            ProjectiontoStr(&P));
00210 
00211   if (!(outfp = fopen(outfilename, "w"))) {
00212     fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfilename);
00213     cleanup(-1);
00214   }
00215 
00216   fprintinfo(outfp);
00217   fprintProjectinfo(outfp, &P);
00218   fprintf(outfp, "# used Symmetry - %s\n", SymmetrytoStr(S));
00219   fprintf(outfp, "# K-mixing,        threshold: %g, minnorm: %g\n", 
00220           threshkmix, minnormkmix);
00221 
00222   // output Observables
00223 
00224   showprojectedObservables(outfp, &P, &Int, &Q, obs, &E, NULL, "");
00225 
00226   fprintf(outfp, "\n# end of file\n");
00227 
00228   fclose(outfp);
00229 
00230   if (savestates)
00231     writeMulticonfigfile(outfilename, &P, &S, &mbname, &E, 1);
00232 
00233   // levels output ?
00234   if (levels) {
00235 
00236     snprintf(outfilename, 255, "%s.%s.levels", mbfile, ProjectiontoStr(&P));
00237     if (!(outfp = fopen(outfilename, "w"))) {
00238       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfilename);
00239       cleanup(-1);
00240     }
00241 
00242     fprintinfo(outfp);
00243     fprintProjectinfo(outfp, &P);
00244     fprintf(outfp, "# K-mixing,        threshold: %g, minnorm: %g\n", 
00245             threshkmix, minnormkmix);
00246 
00247     // output levels
00248 
00249     showSpectrum(outfp, &P, obs, &E);
00250   
00251     fclose(outfp);
00252   }
00253 
00254   cleanup(0);
00255 
00256 #ifdef MPI
00257   }
00258 #endif
00259 }
